Ding Zhen (Great Unification)
Wang Yuan's failure to shoot dragons proves that he has no quality
King of Litang in fresh clothes angry horse

Occupying a city will give you 1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity. When "Pearl" and "Snow Leopard" kill non-barbarian units, they will get [ICON_GreatMerchant] points equal to 25% of the opponent's [ICON_Strength] combat power. [NEWLINE] Completing the city project "Wang Yuan Capture Plan" "Detoxification of Traditional Cigarettes" will provide all units with 5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power
Great Lord Ding Zhen, you will unify the world of traditional cigarettes and electronic cigarettes, and conquer everyone with your powerful charm
+5 Hunting King O Combat Strength Bonus
+5 I GOT SMOKE
Dude lived in a tall building without much effort
Dude lived in a tall building without much effort
Hello, my buddy's name is Ding Zhen, welcome to my village to play with Rika.
“Ladies and gentlemen, ladies and gentlemen, hello, today I am honored to be a child on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau to come to ​Jianhe​ country and tell stories about me and my animal friends.

My village is called Zhanzhika. It is small, but the Genie Mountains and Hengduan Mountains are huge. This world not only belongs to me, but also belongs to my animal friends. There are sambars near my hometown. They are called Hawa in Tibetan, Lawa in Tibetan, and blue sheep in Tibetan. I have encountered them when I was riding and grazing. The wolf is called Shanke in Tibetan, and the Tibetan fox is called Wa in Tibetan. At night, there are snow leopards stepping on the ice and snow, there are eagles in the sky, and there are bugs in the grass.
We Tibetans say that there are 100,000 lives in a drop of water.

I have been studying hard lately, both in books and in nature. I want to tell you that nature can also teach us a lot. I hope that everyone, especially the children, can come to my hometown to learn in nature, and let my wild animal friends teach you.
Today I also brought gifts, which are Litang's environmental protection conventions and nature books, produced by the government and my fellow villagers and colleagues. ​”
I am willing to smoke the same pipe as you, and we can talk together.
Don't get in my way of making money, you stinky beggar, you're not qualified yet.
Can my sister and brother match me up with my uncle?
Yi! Enlightenment!
The culture should be synchronized with the junior high school students first.
I measure your size.
I measure your size.
After all, the world cannot tolerate electronic cigarettes.
Unexpectedly, you still prefer traditional cigarettes.
It is a great honor for you to have your delegation come to Litang.
Let me declare here that Litang does not collect garbage.
I want to send a delegation to your country to promote e-cigarettes, can you accept it?
Little Heizi, let me measure your size.
Every second you live with the remnants of traditional cigarettes like you is a waste of air.
Welcome to Litang. After enjoying this beautiful scenery, I think you already know what is great, right?
Want to smoke together?
Want one?
righteous! service!
I didn't expect that you also like electronic cigarettes. It's really like-minded.
(Ding Zhen's affection for you has increased)
It's time for you to draw pictures of the remnants of traditional cigarettes like you!
(Ding Zhen's affection for you has decreased)
You should be delighted to have formed a friendly state with Litang.
I can let you go this time.
Shut up, stop being obscene!
How about sitting down and smoking one together?
Litang is willing to open the door for you.
Take a look at yourself in the mirror, do you think you deserve it?
Litang needs to borrow your way.
My little pony can overwhelm your armies.
